tripleplay.gesture

Class Tap

  • java.lang.Object
    • tripleplay.gesture.GestureBase<Tap>
      • tripleplay.gesture.Tap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Gesture<Tap>

    public class Tap
extends GestureBase<Tap>
    A simple touch gesture. May support 1 to 4 fingers. If greedy, will indicate a held touch, and will cancel if the fingers start to move.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface tripleplay.gesture.Gesture
